org.sonar.vary.plugin.coverage

Interface CoverageParser

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BullseyeParser, CoberturaParser

    public interface CoverageParser
    The interface a coverage report parser has to implement in order to be used by CxxCoverageSensor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void processReport(org.sonar.api.resources.Project project, org.sonar.api.batch.SensorContext context, java.io.File report, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,org.sonar.api.measures.CoverageMeasuresBuilder> coverageData)
      Parses the given report and stores the results in the according builder

    • Method Detail

      • processReport

        void processReport(org.sonar.api.resources.Project project,
                 org.sonar.api.batch.SensorContext context,
                 java.io.File report,
                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,org.sonar.api.measures.CoverageMeasuresBuilder> coverageData)
                   throws javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException
        Parses the given report and stores the results in the according builder
        Parameters:
        xmlFile - The report to parse
        coverageData - A Map mapping source file names to coverage measures. Has to be used to store the results into.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException
